duties_responsibilities.duty: Haul Machinery, Coils, Pipe, Lumber, Rebar, and specialize in over dimension loads.
Providing E-Z pass and Pre pass for convenience.
Manage freight on lightweight all-aluminum frame flatbed trailer.
Ensure on-time delivery and safe transportation of goods.
Complete required documentation and log books accurately.
Adhere to safety regulations and procedures at all times.
Participate in orientation and ongoing training sessions.

education_certification.credential: Class A License (CDL-A) and current DOT medical card.
